none: Blast For Me - Blast For Me
Blast For Me - Blast For Me

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 22, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 No cover. Tape says BLAST FOR ME on both sides. Five minutes of ripping fastcore/grind.......with samples about drugs and enchiladas. You know what to do. BLAST FOR ME
